sidestore.name: SideStore
sidestore.title: No AltServer Anymore
sidestore.subtitle: SideStore is a fork of AltStore but no longer requires PC to refresh/install .ipa files.

archlinux.name: Arch Linux
archlinux.title: The New Generation to Linux
archlinux.subtitle: Arch Linux is lightweight linux distro with rolling package system, fully customized installation.

dockur-windows.title: Windows, but on Docker
dockur-windows.subtitle: dockur/windows is a github repository for running Windows vm via QEMU on a docker container
